description:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. Overview

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable solutions.

Responsibilities

• Lead technical projects from conception to deployment
• Write clean, maintainable code
• Mentor junior developers

Education and Experience

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
• 5+ years of experience in software development

Skills

• JavaScript/TypeScript
• React
• Node.js
• AWS

Benefits

• Competitive salary
• Health insurance
• 401(k) matching
